improvements_made.description: Add a text cleaning helper function for word frequency analysis
Add a rule-based sentiment analysis helper function
Add a helper function to sanitize subreddit name inputs
Expand the database schema to include a sentiment_score column for persisting analysis results
Add a helper function to calculate 'post velocity' (score per hour)
Add a stop-word filtering helper to improve the quality of word frequency analysis
Add a helper function to identify the peak posting hour from a collection of posts.
Add a basic keyword-based sentiment analysis helper function to process post titles
Add a helper function to identify the most frequent contributors in a set of posts
Add a helper function to calculate the engagement ratio (comments per upvote).
Add a trending score helper function to calculate post momentum using time decay
Add a helper function to extract meaningful keywords by filtering out common stop words.
Add a helper function to calculate the Jaccard similarity between two sets of keywords for subreddit comparison.
Add a helper function to perform basic lexicon-based sentiment analysis on post titles.
Add a helper function to analyze and rank the primary domains (content sources) from a list of post URLs.
Add a helper function to calculate the average engagement (score + comments) per hour to determine peak activity times.
Add a helper function to calculate post velocity (score per hour) to identify rapidly trending content.
Add a helper function to filter out common English stop words for cleaner word frequency analysis.
Add a helper function to categorize Reddit posts by media type (Text, Image, Video, Link).
Add a basic sentiment analysis helper to categorize post titles into positive, negative, and neutral sentiments.
Add a helper function to identify the most active authors/contributors from a list of posts.
Add a helper function to extract the most frequent two-word phrases (bigrams) from titles to help identify trending topics.
Add a helper function to calculate a controversy index (comment-to-score ratio) to identify highly debated posts.
Add a helper function to calculate the hour of the day with the highest average engagement from a list of hour-score pairs.
Add a function to categorize URLs into content types like Image, Video, and Discussion.
Complete the sentiment analysis helper function using a keyword-based scoring system.
Add a helper function to extract top keywords, filtering out common stop words and punctuation.
Add a trending score calculator using a time-decay formula to identify 'hot' content.
Add a helper function to extract top phrases (n-grams) for more contextual trending topic detection.
Add a helper function to format large engagement metrics into human-readable strings.
Add a helper function to categorize post URLs into media types (Image, Video, Self-post, or Article).
Complete the basic sentiment analysis helper function to categorize text into positive, negative, and neutral buckets.
Add a helper function to aggregate timestamps into a 24-hour frequency distribution.
Add a helper function to identify viral outliers in engagement metrics.
Add a text preprocessing helper to filter out common stop words for more meaningful word frequency analysis.
Add a helper function to calculate the engagement rate relative to the subreddit's total subscriber count.
Add a text cleaning helper to remove URLs and Markdown formatting from Reddit content
Add a helper function to calculate post velocity (score per hour).
Add a helper function to perform basic keyword-based sentiment analysis on post titles or content.
Add a helper function to categorize post hours into time-of-day segments.
Add a helper function to sanitize subreddit name inputs safely.
Add a helper function to calculate engagement density (comments-to-score ratio).
